/* Set *XLATE_P to a handle node for converting from FROMPAGE to TOPAGE. Returns APR_EINVAL or APR_ENOTIMPL, if a conversion isn't supported. If fail for any other reason, return the error.
Allocate *RET in POOL. */
/* Convert SRC_LENGTH bytes of SRC_DATA in NODE->handle, store the result in *DEST, which is allocated in POOL. */
unit.function_decl: apr_status_t svn_subr__win32_xlate_to_stringbuf(win32_xlate_t *handle, const char *src_data, apr_size_t src_length, svn_stringbuf_t **dest, apr_pool_t *pool);
